sentences: In the decision on the work of the LEG (FCCC/CP/2004/L.13), the COP requests the LEG to prepare a mandate with possible elements to be considered at SBI-23 on the role of the LEG in support of the implementation of NAPAs, and potential technical and financial difficulties that LDCs may have in the implementation of NAPAs.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
